Hierarch Asterios:
Corrupting Darkness embittered residents of the Colony Fay. Cocoons, which they began to build, just huge.
But the strange thing is that the trees they have not changed. Said that thanks to Fertilizer Timiniel, by which the Tetrarch FairiesNoeti Mimirid caring for the trees.
Go to the Noeti Mimirid and ask for a little fertilizer.
